db:abstract.db:para: The QScxmlCompiler class is a compiler for SCXML files.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Parses an SCXML file and dynamically instantiates a state machine for a successfully parsed SCXML file. If parsing fails, the new state machine cannot start. All errors are returned by QScxmlStateMachine::parseErrors().

To load an SCXML file, QScxmlStateMachine::fromFile or QScxmlStateMachine::fromData should be used. Using QScxmlCompiler directly is only needed when the compiler needs to use a custom QScxmlCompiler::Loader.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlCompiler::QScxmlCompiler(QXmlStreamReader *reader)
db:section.db:para: Creates a new SCXML compiler for the specified reader.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlStateMachine *QScxmlCompiler::compile()
db:section.db:para: Parses an SCXML file and creates a new state machine from it.
If parsing is successful, the returned state machine can be initialized and started. If parsing fails, QScxmlStateMachine::parseErrors() can be used to retrieve a list of errors.

db:section.db:title: QVector<QScxmlError> QScxmlCompiler::errors() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of parse errors.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlCompiler::fileName() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the file name associated with the current input.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlCompiler::Loader *QScxmlCompiler::loader() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the loader that is currently used to resolve and load URIs for the SCXML compiler.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlCompiler::setFileName(const QString &fileName)
db:section.db:para: Sets the file name for the current input to fileName.
The file name is used for error reporting and for resolving relative path URIs.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlCompiler::setLoader(QScxmlCompiler::Loader *newLoader)
db:section.db:para: Sets newLoader to be used for resolving and loading URIs for the SCXML compiler.
